activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#9717
activity.text:
> this approach doesn't work for multiple reasons
> 
> 1. if you go to a specific page directly by pasting it's link in the browser, this shows facility tab regardless of what page it is currently in.
> 2. if you somehow let's say reach facility page through users profile, or patient details or anywhere else, the active tab doesn't automatically change to that.

so the collision approach was better i guess.. i thought tab should not change once upon inter-navigation

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#9192
activity.text:
Changes made in last commits
- Form Validation using Zod, old validator functions (eg. EmailValidator etc) are used to refine validation
- Add dirty state to prevent form submission when there is no change
- Added new shadcn components eg form, Switch, Calendar, Select, Switch, TextArea.
-  Refactor shadcn calendar to remove error

but there are changes required in
- Phone Number input field , converting to new PhoneNumberFormField using ShadCN Select (just like Location Select)
- Fix the layout of Calendar 
- Improve CSS and styling

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#9192
activity.text: Thank You so much :)

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#9192
activity.text:
> Closing as the related issue is closed as not planned.

Hi @rithviknishad sir,
I’ve almost completed the AssetCreate form using Shadcn components, including the dirty state. The only task left is applying the tailwind classes, which I plan to finish today. I was about to make a commit tonight.
The form now restores all the original functionality, with improved state management and reduced clutter.
